member.name: T:Castle.Components.DictionaryAdapter.DictionaryAdapterFactory
member.summary: Uses Reflection.Emit to expose the properties of a dictionary through a dynamic implementation of a typed interface.

member.name: T:Castle.Components.DictionaryAdapter.IDictionaryAdapterFactory
member.summary: Defines the contract for building typed dictionary adapters.

member.name: M:Castle.Components.DictionaryAdapter.IDictionaryAdapterFactory.GetAdapter``1(System.Collections.IDictionary)
member.summary: Gets a typed adapter bound to the dictionary.
member.returns: An implementation of the typed interface bound to the dictionary.
member.remarks: The type represented by the T must be an interface with properties.

member.name: M:Castle.Components.DictionaryAdapter.DictionaryAdapterFactory.GetAdapter``1(System.Collections.IDictionary)
member.summary: Gets a typed adapter bound to the dictionary.
member.returns: An implementation of the typed interface bound to the dictionary.
member.remarks: The type represented by T must be an interface with properties.
